rows: Islamic terrorists shoot the daughter of a civilian to death after an unsuccessful attempt to abduct her from her family.
Two civilians are abducted and killed by the Mujahideen.
72-year old man stoned to death by al-Aksa Martyrs Brigade.
Badly burnt body of a 70-year old man (father of nine) found after being kidnapped by Fatah-al-Aqsa.
Islamic "Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat" ambushes a security convoy and kills forty-nine, wounds nineteen.
Thirteen members of two families are killed in an attack by Islamic extremists.
Twenty-three people are killed and more than one-hundred injured by twin Palestinian suicide bombers.
Mujahideen behead three villagers, including a father and son.
Prominent liquor dealer slain by Islamic fundamentalists while pumping gas.
Five people killed, one badly wounded in attack on village by Islamic extremists. Victims include a 37-year-old woman, her two children, ages 2 and 5, and her two uncles.
Eight killed in an ambush on a security convoy.
A policeman is abducted and murdered by Islamists as the body of a civilian tortured to death by the same group surfaces.
Nine Russians killed by Mujahideen rocket attack.  Three others are wounded.
Three Jihad attacks leave two civilians dead and seven more injured. (Ghulam Qadir, Baramulla, Nihama).
21-year-old woman stabbed to death by Pakistani on her wedding day for rejecting an arranged Muslim marriage.
The Mujahideen fire into the home of a civilian, killing his wife and son.
Two sons of a civilian suspected of providing information on terrorist activities are kidnapped from their home, tortured and then shot dead.
Two Palestinian gunmen from Jenin penetrate a farming community and open fire on random vehicles.  One civilian is killed, five are injured.
Gaza gunmen opens fire on two Israeli soldiers near Egyptian border.  One is killed, the other injured.
A police detective and father of three is stabbed to death by a Muslim terrorist.
Three civilians are abducted and murdered by militant Muslims.
Terrorists kill a village constable and injure three other civilians.
The Mujahideen kill a police officer in his home.  Three family members are injured.
Two Hamas gunmen open fire on a house, killing a father and injuring his four-year-old daughter along with two others.
Bomb blast at a carnival kills eight and injures fifteen.  Islamic hardliners behind the attack.
Hamas (Islamic Resistance) terrorists kill a father of five as he is eating dinner with his family.  Three others, including a 5-year-old girl are wounded.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen gunmen enter a house and kill a police officer, his 16-year-old son and another child.
Twenty-one people are injured by a Hizb-e-Islami grenade attack on a bus.
Five persons are murdered in Bangladesh by members of the Jamaatul Mujahideen extremists group.
Bomb planted in a rickshaw near a college kills one Indian soldier.
Terrorists kill two men belonging to a civilian defense force (established to protect villagers from Muslim terrorists).
One killed and four injured when a terrorist rocket hits a residential house.
Two men are abducted and murdered by the Mujahideen.  The same group shoots another civilian to death on the same night.
Gunmen fires from behind bushes at two American servicemen, waiting at a traffic light.  Both suffer multiple gunshot wounds, one is killed.
Mujahideen terrorists abduct and behead a villager.
Islamists halt a passenger bus, then drag off two civilians and shoot them to death by the side of the road.
Hamas terrorists ambush and kill three Israeli soldiers protecting an intersection.
Religious extremists kill a writer who was critical of the Taliban, along with two patrons at a shop.
Mujahideen target a police vehicle killing one and wounding six.
Taliban gunmen attack a UNHCR convoy, killing two and wounding one.
Car bomb explodes in Christian residential area killing one and injuring three.
Two brutal attacks leaves two civilians dead (Dangiwacha & Mawar).
Group calling itself the Student Islamic Movement of India detonates bomb in a crowded area, killing a woman and injuring twenty-seven.
After being raped by her brothers, and refusing to commit suicide as her mother suggested, a teenage girl is stabbed and beaten to death by her father.
Two men are gunned down by Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists for refusing to support them.
Three Palestinians die when a home-made bomb detonates prematurely.
al-Qaeda landmine blows up a passenger bus, killing eighteen and injuring one.
A militant Muslim kills a civilian and injures fifteen more, including women and children, with a grenade.
The editor of a newspaper is assassinated by the Hizb-ul-Mujahideen.
A sectarian attack inside a mosque leaves two people dead and two injured.
A Jaish-e-Mohammad member kills a police officer.
Two Russians killed by a car-bomb blast in Grozny.
Device hidden in a stuffed toy explodes near a home's entrance, killing an 8-year-old girl.
Motorcycle bomb in a commercial area kills one, injures two.
Head of a Sunni school assassinated by radical Shiites.
Muslim rebels ambush riot police, killing three and wounding three.
Muslim terrorists force their way into a civilian's home, killing him and injuring his brother.
al-Aqsa gunmen attack an army outpost in the West Bank and kill two soldiers.
Two more Sunni scholars gunned down by Muslim radicals.
Two civilians are killed in a Mujahideen ambush.
Muslim militants assassinate a top Kurdish politician and five others with automatic weapons and grenades.
Two policeman were killed by Muslim extremists, who had erected a fake roadblock.  A third policeman is shot to death in El Harrach.
Jihadists bomb a gas station, killing three policemen.
A civilian is kidnapped from his home and murdered by Islamic radicals.
Taliban attack on an Afghan vehicle checkpoint leaves seven dead and twelve wounded.
Muslim guerillas kill three soldiers and injure eight more in an ambush.  Soldiers were on a morning jog.
Palestinian sniper guns down Israeli soldier in front of the Church of the Nativity.
Hiz-ul-Mujahideen terrorists abduct and kill three civilians.
Militants blow-up police vehicle, killing one and injuring four.
Five civilians are abducted from their homes by Muslim terrorists.  Three are beheaded in captivity.
Two security force personnel are attacked and killed while on police patrol.
Hamas terrorists use a roadside bomb to kill four Israeli soldiers who were in a passing tank.
A man killed by radicals a few days after he lost his brother to the same group is one of two people killed in separate attacks.
Vice Governor of a Saudi province is gunned down after angering the fundamentalist element by suggesting that Saudi royalty should take women's opinions into account.
Ambush by Muslim rebels on a convoy kills seven soldiers and leaves eleven more injured.
Muslims attack a Christian village, burning and murdering at least fourteen civilians.
Six Hindu civilians are blown apart by a road-mine planted by Muslim militants.
Abu Sayyaf car bomb explodes near the airport, killing one and injuring six other civilians.
A 17-year old is killed and about ten others injured by a terror bombing.
British man shot to death by Islamists while waiting at a traffic light.
A photographer and a woman are murdered in separate attacks by Muslim extremists.
A policeman is killed by Islamists.
Two policeman are killed and one civilian is injured in a Muslim terrorist attack.
The Mujahideen kill a young boy with a landmine.
Nine Shi'ite worshippers are killed in a terrorist shooting attack outside a mosque.  At least eight others are wounded.
Four local security guards are kidnapped by Muslim extremists, taken to the desert and then killed by having their throats slit.
Two villagers are killed when Muslim terrorists break down the door to their home and spray the inside with bullets.
Four civilians are gunned down by the Hizb-ul-Mujahideen in their village.
Muslim militants are suspected in the murder of two tribesmen on a road.
Senior Afghan official gunned down in Taliban-sponsored attack.  His bodyguard is also injured in the shooting.
Armed Islamists set up bogus roadblock and then stab or shoot to death twelve civilians.  Seven others are injured in the attack.
Pro-Jakarta militiamen attack a minibus in East Timor, killing one person and injuring two pregnant women.
A man is pulled brutally from his home and killed by a group of radical Muslims.
Muslim rebels attack a logging company and kill two employees.
Ansar al-Islam suicide bomber kills three Kurdish guards at a checkpoint.
Three Russian soldiers killed by Jihadi car-bomb in Chechnya.
A man is gunned down in a sectarian attack.
Sunni terrorists kill two Shiites in a shooting attack at their coffee shop.
Militant Muslims abduct a man from his house and take him to a forest, where he is shot to death.
Islamic extremists guns down two police officers guarding a U.S. embassy.  Five other officers and a passer-by are also wounded.
Muslim rebels burn ten homes in a Christian village, killing at least one person.
Muslims invade the home of a Hindu farmer, chop him to death and then rape three members of his family.
Terrorist bomb kills businessman and injures two bystanders.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists invade a house and kill a woman. Another is injured.
Muslim rebels plant a bomb at a civilian airport.  Twenty-one are killed in the blast and about 150 others are injured.  Among the dead is an American missionary and several children.
A pro-Russian Chechen commander and one other are killed by a bomb hidden in a sofa.  Four others in an adjacent house were injured.
A Palestinian suicide bomber blows up a bus, killing at least fifteen and injuring thirty-seven.  A 14-year-old American girl is among the dead.
Muslim rebels attack a remote village and kill four civilians.
Palestinians dressed as Jewish seminary students infiltrate a settlement and kill a husband and wife sitting down to dinner, along with one guest.  They also shoot eight other civilians.
Two Moro Islamic Liberation Front bomb attacks kill one and injure two at a Catholic school.
Three civilians are killed in separate attacks by Muslim terrorists.
One Israeli is killed and four more injured after roadside attack by Palestinians.
Muslim rebels stop a bus full of commuters, kill two, and then take dozens hostage.
al-Qaeda car bomb kills three Afghani tribesmen and injures five more.
Two policemen were killed and two more badly injured by terrorist bomb in the United Arab Emirates
The Mujahideen plant a bomb at a candy shop that kills two civilians and injures nine more.
Separate Mujahideen attacks in Kashmir leave two policemen dead and two more injured.

Islamic hardliners responsible for blast on a commuter train that kills eight women, two men and leaves more than 55 injured on the tenth anniversary of another series of Islamic bombings that killed two-hundred-fifty-seven and injured more than 1000.
Islamic militants open up on a civilian vehicle, killing two and wounding five others, including an 18-month-old baby.
Four people, including a 6-year-old boy, are killed and thirty more injured by a bomb planted on a bus in Kashmir by an Islamic group.
Two civilians are shot to death by the Mujahideen.
Militant Islamics attack a hotel, take nine people hostage, spray fire and throw grenades at a crowded marketplace from an upper floor.  Seven people are killed and fifteen injured.
Muslims attack a remote police station and kill thirteen, including two civilians.  Two people were abducted and later found dead with slit throats.  Five others are injured in the attack.
Two civilians lose their lives in brutal attacks by the Islamic militants.
A man is abducted from his home and murdered by Muslim terrorists.
Armed Muslims shouting "we are going to finish off the infidels" attack a Christian village and kill at least 22 villagers.  More than forty-four others were injured or missing.
Islamic boat attack kills one and leaves two injured.
Rebel bomb attack on a Roman Catholic church during mass injures five worshippers.
Taliban attack a remote army post, capture Afghan soldiers and then stab them to death.
The Mujahideen gun down one man on a city street, and another inside his home in separate attacks.
Moro Islamic Liberation Front attacks a civilian minibus and kills nine, wounds four.  They stopped and boarded the bus, then specifically targeted non-Muslim males only.
Terrorists throw grenade into a group of security personnel, killing one and injuring four.
A grenade tossed into a street by a militant kills two civilians and injures two more.
Bomb kills one and leaves thirteen others injured in southern Lebanon.
Moro Islamic Liberations Front attacks a post and kills three civilians, wounds two others.
Militant Muslims ambush a security patrol, killing two members and injuring four.
Two civilians are brutally abducted from their home and shot to death by Islamic terrorists.
Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists invade a police officer's home and kill a young woman, injure two more.
Ansar al-Islam suicide bomber kills five, including and ABC journalist and wounds eight others at a Kurdish checkpoint.

Muslims militants cleanse a village of Hindus, ordering them out of their houses and opening up with machine guns.  The twenty-four dead include eleven women and two children. Eight of the victims were over 60.  An unknown number were wounded.
Muslim-American soldier throws three grenades into the tents of non-Muslim American soldiers.  Two are killed and eleven others are wounded.
Taliban attack against a routine patrol leaves four dead and six injured.  In a separate incident in Yewar, Taliban terrorists captured five allied troops, slaughtered them and amputated their limbs.
A woman is killed inside her home by the Mujahideen.
Islamists stop a cargo truck, tie up the Christian driver and his helper then shoot them to death.
Nine civilians are slaughtered by Muslim fundamentalists on an isolated road between two towns.
Muslim rebels stop a car driven by the brother of a government minister and kill him along with his female passenger.
Rebel landmine planted in a city street kills four Russians and injures three.
Hindu political leader assassinated by Muslim gunmen on a motorcycle.
Militant bomb attack kills the driver of an oil tanker and injures six others.
Muslims blast Christian village with RPGs, killing seven, including a six-year-old child and injuring five others.
Islamic fundamentalists invade a family home, kill the parents and injure four children, then murder two youths who were outside the home at the time.
A young girl is shot to death in her home by armed Muslims.
A man and his wife are dragged from their home by the Mujahideen and killed in the street.
Armed fundamentalists kill twelve villagers in a late night attack.
Islamic terrorists kill a man and his son after a home invasion.  Later, in Pannad, six other civilians are captured and mutilated by having their noses cut off.
Four American soldiers are killed at a checkpoint by a suicide bomber.
Another Muslim rebel attack against a civilian home, this time of a farmer, who is shot to death along with his wife and two young children.
Muslim rebel throws dynamite into the house of a fisherman, killing his wife, two young children and two other relatives.
Islamic Jihad terrorist walks into a beachfront cafe and blows himself up, injuring more than thirty civilians.
Mujahideen rebels assassinate a member of the ruling political party.
A 14-year-old girl is among three civilians murdered by the Mujahideen in separate attacks.
Truck bomb against the British Embassy in Tehran leaves one dead.
Islamic militant lobs a grenade at a crowd of people, kills one and injures twelve.
Eighteen people are injured when militant Muslims toss a grenade into a bus stand.  Elsewhere (Chewdara) a woman is killed and her daughter injured.
Moro Islamic Front terrorist bomb kills sixteen people (including several children) at a wharf and injures at least forty-four
Six Taliban gunmen assassinate a political figure in the Afghan government along with his nephew.
Muslim terrorists invade a residence and kill a man, his wife and their 2-year-old daughter.
Abu Sayyaf rebels ambush a village convoy, kill one and injure two.
Bomb attack on a passenger bus by Muslim rebels kills at least eight and leaves ten others injured.
Indonesian military raids Christian town, burning Bibles and churches, killing two Baptist pastors along with at least thirteen others.  Other Christians were tortured.
In a particularly heinous attack, two female car bombers drive up to a U.S. checkpoint, scream for help, then kill the three soldiers rushing to their assistance.  Two others are injured.
Armed Muslims attack a village, kill a woman and burn down the houses of Christians.
A doctor is gunned down in a sectarian attack.
Five military personnel injured by Taliban terrorist bomb attack on a headquarters.
A civilian is killed in an IED blast.
Another bomb planted by Muslim separatists explodes at a bus terminal, injuring eleven.
Two people, including a town mayor, were killed and two more injured by a bomb which exploded in front of an electrical shop.
In a horrible attack, the Mujahideen pull a man from his home and shoot him to death in a field.
Muslim terrorists kill five civilians in a drive-by attack.
Landmine planted by Muslim rebels in the heart of Grozny kills five policemen riding in a car and three civilian bystanders.
Two boys killed by terrorist landmine.
Suicide bomber seriously injures four U.S. Marines guarding a checkpoint.
Mob attack inside a Mosque leaves two Shiite clerics dead.
Palestinian terrorists infiltrate an Israeli training camp and kill two, injure nine.
Thirteen soldiers were killed in an ambush by members of the Moro Islamic Liberation Front.
Three separate grenade attacks by Islamic militants kills a physician and injures another thirty-one people (Qazigund, Shopiyan & Anantnag).
One person is killed and two injured by Taliban loyalists attempting a political assassination in a motorcycle attack.
Car bomb detonates prematurely killing the four terrorists inside, who include a former Taliban intelligence officer.
15-year old Muslim kills four soldiers and injures two others in a grenade attack on a vehicle.
Two Afghan soldiers are shot to death in a terrorist attack by extremists.
Terrorist bomb kills two soldiers riding in a truck.
Two Hizb-ul-Mujahideen members force their way into a civilian home and shoot a woman to death.  Her husband is injured in the attack.
Two Islamic rebels kill a political official and injure seven others in a grenade attack on a restaurant.
Mujahideen warriors kill sixteen civilians in a filmed attack on two vehicles.
The Mujahideen assassinate a political figure.
Hamas gunman enters a place of business and sprays fire from an automatic weapon.  Two Israelis are killed and seven injured.
Three women were injured by a Moro Islamic Liberation Front bomb placed on a passenger bus.
A man is yanked from his home and shot to death by Islamic radicals.
Muslim militants kill one and injure eight civilians in a bombing.
Muslim militants attack a police station, kill one and injure two.
British geologist murdered by Eritrean Islamic Jihad.  The same group also took credit for a landmine attack in February that killed five Eritrean soldiers on routine border patrol.
The bullet-riddled body of a fruit merchant is found two days after he was abducted.
Muslim grenade attack against civilians at a protest rally leaves two dead and fourteen injured.
Two people are abducted by the Mujahideen.  The survivor is released after his ears, nose and tongue are chopped off.
Six civilians, including a 12-year old girl are killed in an ambush by Islamic rebels.  Three others are badly injured.
Taliban rocket attack on an airport kills three and leave two injured.
Terrorist bombing attack by Muslim separatists kills six and injures more than a dozen.
Muslims set fire to a house, killing a Christian pastor and six other members of his family, including his wife and three children.
Mujahideen fighters abduct three young men out hunting and torture them to death.  Also three government officials are shot to death while sitting in a car.
Terrorists abduct then kill two civilians out grazing their cattle.
Muslim bomb kills one policeman and injures three members of a bomb disposal unit.
al-Aqsa member detonates a bomb at a railway station, killing a 23-year old guard and injuring more than a dozen bystanders.
Islamic rebels attack a passenger bus, killing at least twelve (including the driver) and taking several hostages.
Two separate attacks by Muslim suicide bombers in the same town kills six and injures six.
Bomb thrown by Muslim separatists next to a courthouse kills three and injures at least thirty-four.
Terrorist bomb injures eleven, including two children.  The target of the bombing was a finance minister who opposed Muslim violence.
Fedayeen suicide attack on a radio station kills three guards and leaves seven others injured.
Bomb set by the Jemaah Islamiyah terrorist group detonates at a Kentucky Fried Chicken restaurant in Indonesia's main airport, injuring eleven people.
Muslim fundamentalists attack a government building, killing three Afghan soldiers and wounding two.
Hamas (Islamic Resistance) suicide bomber blows up a night club, killing three Israelis and injuring at least fifty-five.
A political activist is killed and four others injured in a Mujahideen attack.
Terrorist lobs grenade at children playing in a field, injuring five of them.
Islamic radicals attack a passenger bus, killing one and injuring three.
Muslim rebels attack two houses and an army post.  Two residents are killed, including a one-year old baby, and six others are injured.
An attack by the Janjaweed on a village earlier in the month leaves at least sixty-four people dead and an unknown number injured. (2003)
Mujahideen fighters kill two Muslims suspected of being informants for an anti-terror unit.
Moro Islamic Front rebels ambush and kill two soldiers and one civilian riding on motorcycles.
Fifteen people are injured when a militant Muslim tosses a grenade at a bus stop.
Ambush by Islamic extremists on two civilian vehicles leaves two dead and three injured.
Muslim separatists attack a Christian village, firing on houses and a hospital.  At least twenty-seven are killed and about two dozen wounded.  Fifteen residents are taken hostage.
Islamic hardliners detonate small bomb in a crowded bus station, killing one and injuring seventeen civilians.
al-Aqsa members ambush a vehicle, killing a father and seriously injuring his 6-year old daughter.  A soldier rushing to help was wounded as well.
Islamic fundamentalists lob a bomb into a security patrol, then proceed to stab and shoot the survivors.  Six are killed.
Terrorist lobs grenade at a police vehicle near a crowd of people.  One civilian is killed and about thirty others injured.
Pro-Karzai cleric is gunned down by Taliban terrorists outside a mosque.
Mujahideen rebels ambush a police vehicle, shooting to death all four people inside.
Al-Mansoorian terrorists ambush a search patrol, killing two and injuring five.
Bomb left at the front door of a Christian missionary couple explodes, killing one person.
Terrorist bomb kills a policeman and injures two other people.
The Mujahideen pull a civilian from his home and kill him after torture.
Hizbul Mujahideen militants kill three political activists of the ruling (PDP) party.
Abu Sayyaf suicide bomber kills thirteen and injures more than forty people in a crowded marketplace.
A civilian is killed in his home, and his sister injured by Islamic radicals.
Fedayeen suicide squad attack on a bank leaves three dead and seven injured.
A village police officer is killed and six other people injured in a grenade attack.
Fatah gunmen kill a 53-year old father of six who was driving to work.

At least sixty people, including seven children, are killed and more than one hundred hospitalized when three suicide bombers detonates a truck bomb outside a government building in a residential area.
The Mujahideen kill an abducted civilian after keeping him hostage for ten days.
Three groups of al Qaeda suicide bombers shoot their way into housing complexes.  The blasts leave thirty-five dead and nearly two-hundred injured.
Three civilians are killed by the Mujahideen in separate attacks.  One was beheaded.  Another was a homeowner's daughter.
Female suicide bomber kills at least fourteen civilians at a festival and leaves nearly one-hundred and fifty injured.
Two civilians are killed in separate attacks.  One in his home in Nagrota.  The other after being abducted from Khawas.
Terrorist bomb thrown into a courthouse where al-Qaeda militant was sentenced to death for killing three U.S. missionaries.
Three separate Mujahideen attacks leave four people dead.
A sectarian attack on a religious procession leaves one dead and eleven injured.
Bombs set at nineteen Shell gas stations in Pakistan injure at least five.
Four terror attacks across the district leave four dead and at least three injured.
Four coordinated suicide attacks by al-Qaeda against Western and Jewish targets leave at least forty-one dead and more than sixty-five injured.
Armed Islamic group ambushes a security patrol, killing three and wounding four.
Militant Muslims invade a home and abduct a husband and wife.  The woman is later killed and the man badly injured.
Two policeman are killed in a terrorist attack by the Muslim Hamadania Brigade.
Hamas (Islamic Resistance) suicide bomber positions himself near a young married couple on a romantic stroll and kills them both.
A Sunni is killed in a sectarian attack.
Two civilians are murdered by the Mujahideen.
A shepherd family of five is attacked and killed in their home by Muslim militants.  Victims include four children and two women.  Most were beheaded.
Muslim suicide bomber, dressed in Jewish religious garb as a disguise, boards a passenger bus and kills seven.  About twenty others are hospitalized.
Jihadis ambush a security patrol killing two members and a civilian.
Muslim radicals force their way into a home and slit the throats of a woman and her daughter.
A civilian is shot to death by the Mujahideen.
Hamas (Islamic Resistance) and Islamic Jihad vie for responsibility of a bombing in a shopping mall that kills three and injures over seventy.
Muslim grenade attack on a Christian convent kills one female teacher and injures another.
Terrorist attack on a Intelligence Bureau vehicle kills one and injures three.
In separate incidents Muslim separatists abduct and kill two civilians.
Islamic troops attack a Christian village, burning homes and killing at least fifty-nine villagers.  They also take captive several women and children (some of whom are killed later).
Hamas detonates pipe bomb under a bus.  Eight passengers are hospitalized.
A sectarian clash leaves a 15-year-old boy dead and eight others injured.
The Mujahideen ambush a convoy and slaughter fourteen people.
Armed Islamic militants kill eight people in western Algeria.
Two people are killed inside their home after Muslim radicals force entry.
Muslim rebels kill five members of a shepherd family, including a mother and three of her children.
Islamics kill fourteen people, all from the same family.  The victims, who include children aged 18-months to 17-years all had their throats slit.
Muslim rebels invade a home and kill three members of a family.
The Mujahideen invade a home and kill a man, his wife and elderly father.
A man is killed, and his wife and son seriously injured when Islamists open fire on their home.
Muslim terrorists gun down a man for traveling with his Christian brother-in-law.
Moro Islamic fighters raid three Christian villages, killing five civilians.
Muslim rebels explode a bomb under a bus, killing seven and injuring fifteen.
Jihad terrorists kill three, including a father and son.
Two school students are killed in a mine attack by militant Muslims.
Four civilians are killed in three separate Mujahideen attacks.
Sunni motorcyclists open fire on the car of a Shiite cleric, wounding him and killing his son.
Two al-Qaeda members throw a bomb at Saudi security personnel, killing two and injuring two.
Militant Muslims abduct and kill three civilians.  Two were brothers grazing their cattle at the time.
Four civilians are killed in separate attacks by Islamic terrorists, including one who is beheaded.
Muslim attack on a Christian village leaves one dead and at least one other injured.
A man is killed in his home by the Mujahideen, who had abducted and murdered a second person earlier.
Three members of a Serb family, including an elderly couple, are beaten to death in their beds by Muslim attackers.
Islamic militants kill eight policeman in an ambush.
Twelve people are murdered and two more injured by Islamic extremists on a remote highway.
Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists shoot a civilian to death in captivity.
Nine people are killed by a Taliban attack.
Female Fedayeen suicide bomber blows up a bus containing civilians and military personnel.  At least seventeen are killed and more than a dozen injured.
An AK-47 attack on a group of civilians by Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists leaves at least one civilian dead.
Muslim terrorists ambush a wedding party, killing three civilians and critically wounding a fourth.
A young woman finally dies after clinging to life for seven months in a coma following a stoning for becoming pregnant.
Suicide bombing attack against a bus carrying international peacekeepers kills four Germans and injures at least a dozen more. One passerby was also killed.
Muslim militants kidnap and brutally execute four Hindu villagers.
Radical Muslims force their way into the home of a widow and shoot her to death.
Hizb-ul Mujahideen terrorists responsible for the murder of a government worker.

Gunmen from three different Islamic terrorist groups, disguised as IDF soldiers, open fire on a checkpoint in Gaza, killing four soldiers and wounding four others.  A fifth soldier is killed in Hebron.
Female Christian pastor stabbed to death by a radical Muslim as she was returning home from work (2003).
Sunni terrorists on motorcycles pull along side a truck full of policemen from the minority Shiite faith and spray them with automatic weapons.  Twelve are killed, nine injured.
Mujahideen bomb attack kills two policeman and injures nine more.
Two civilians are abducted and murdered by the Mujahideen in separate incidents (Karoos & Wanigam-Tragbal).
A government official is assassinated by Islamists.
Hamas (Islamic Resistance) bomber, disguised as an Orthodox Jew blows up a bus, killing sixteen and injuring at least one-hundred and twelve.
Nine Sunni Muslims were killed and at least six others wounded in a religiously motivated attack by followers of the Shiite Muslim faith.
Islamic extremists slit the throats of three captured civilians.
Two people, including a deputy mayor are assassinated by armed Islamists.
Terrorist blast kills two Indian soldiers and injures five more.
Two civilians are abducted and slaughtered by the Mujahideen.  Another civilian suffers the same fate in Angmattipora.
In separate incidents a Sunni activist and a civil engineer are killed in sectarian violence.
Mujahideen militants kill three civilians, including two women, after forcing their way into a home.
Attack by armed Islamic group leaves eight security force personnel dead and two wounded.
Four policemen are killed, and another injured, by terrorist bombing.
Terrorists invade a home and kill one of the women living there.
In separate incidents, Muslim militants assassinate the son of a local politician in his home then kill two more people by setting a bomb in a market district.
Palestinian gunmen open fire on a civilian car, killing a 7-year old girl and wounding her 3-year old sister along with her brother and grandfather.
Shooting attack on a car by Muslim militants leaves four dead and one wounded.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen goes on a rampage in a village, setting homes on fire and killing two people, including a teenage boy.
Four people killed by armed Islamic extremists in an attack on a civilian vehicle.
Fedayeen attack on an ambulance kills one American and injures two more.
Father of six working in his grocery is killed by an Islamic Jihad suicide bomber.
One killed and three others injured by a bomb set by Islamic fundamentalists.
Suicide bombing by two Muslims kills six policeman and injures at least three dozen civilians.
In separate incidents, two women are abducted and killed by Muslim terrorists.  One was shot to death and the other had poison injected into her.
Mujahideen grenade attack in a crowded marketplace injures twenty-seven.
Israeli-American is killed by Hamas (Islamic Resistance) gunmen when driving through the West Bank with his elderly parents (also shot) and his wife.
Shia leader gunned down by Sunni rivals.
Five members of the same family, including three children were slaughtered by Islamic fundamentalists in an attack on a village.
Three civilians are murdered by Muslim radicals, including a 34-year-old woman who is tortured before being killed.
Terrorists invade the home of an 80-year old man and kill him along with his son and daughter-in-law.
Muslim militants explode a bomb near a crowded bus, killing two civilians and injuring thirty-three others.
A 20-year-old woman is abducted, sexually assaulted, and murdered by Mujahideen, who say that she was an informer.
Four are killed, four others injured when a bomb carried by the Al Aqsa Martyrs Brigade explodes prematurely.
Six British military policemen are murdered by a Shiite mob.  Eight others are wounded in the attack.
Taliban ambush a military vehicle in route and kill two of the occupants with point-blank machine gun fire.
Islamic fundamentalists kill eight villagers, including six children.  They also kidnap a 24-year old woman.
Muslim terrorist attack on a remote army camp kills two and injures one.
Two civilians are killed by Muslim terrorists in separate incidents.  One involved a home invasion and the other was a shepherd who was abducted while grazing his cattle.
Explosive device near a truck carrying Iraqi electrical workers kills one and injures one.
Israeli security guard is shot and killed by an Arab youth sent by al-Aqsa martyrs brigade.
Former Islamist, who renounced extremists views, is kidnapped by Islamists and is murdered by having his throat cut.
Civilian kidnapped, tortured and killed by Muslim terrorists.
Fedayeen suicide attack on a military barracks kills twelve men and injures seven.  Most of the victims were sleeping when attacked.
A man is killed in his home by the Mujahideen.
Terrorist attack on an administrative building leaves four dead and eight wounded.
Two civilians killed by Muslim terrorists, one other is injured.
Radical Muslims drag a 19-year-old girl out of her home and shoot her to death in the street.
Explosives hidden in a Mosque for use against American explode prematurely killing at least five and injuring more than fifteen.
One day after agreeing to a cease-fire, Fatah gunmen open up on a truck carrying foreign construction workers.  One Bulgarian is killed.
A civilian is gunned down by the Mujahideen, who injure ten civilians in a separate grenade attack.
A man is killed, and his wife injured in a Jihad attack on their home.
Two civilians are kidnapped and executed by Muslim radicals.
The Jaish-e-Mohammed abducts and murders two police officers.
U.S. soldier guarding the National Museum is gunned down by a sniper.
Islamic terrorists toss a grenade and open fire into a political meeting, killing two people and wounding twenty.  Two others later die of injuries.
Sunni attack on a Shia Mosque, involving suicide bombers and automatic weapons, leaves fifty-three worshipers dead and at least sixty more injured.
Three government officials killed by Islamic fundamentalists at a roadblock
Two civilians are gunned down in separate Mujahideen attacks.
24-year old British journalist shot in the back of the head by Fedayeen assassin outside a museum.
Jihad terrorist bombing leaves seven Iraqi police recruits dead.  More than forty are injured.
Catholic priest, who received death threats from fundamentalist Muslims, is shot and killed in his home.
Two Fedayeen suicide bombers, both female, kill fourteen young people and injure at least two dozen others attending a rock concert.
Bomb planted by Muslim rebels in a passenger car kills three policemen and injures two.
Three people, including two children, are killed in two separate incidents.
U.S. soldier guarding Baghdad University is shot in the back and killed.
Palestinian terrorists shoot and kill a 35-year old man suspected of being an Israeli collaborator.
Three Islamic gunmen open fire on a group of Hindu villagers, killing five, including two women, and critically injuring one.
Suicide bomber identified as Islamic Jihad kills a 65-year old grandmother of twenty watching TV in her house.  Three of her grandchildren are injured.
Hizbul Mujahideen terrorists assassinate political activist.
Muslim militants kill a civilian and one of their own who was attempting to surrender.
The Hizb-ul-Mujahideen kill a civilian at his village.
A Christian-owned restaurant is bombed.  Five people suffer injuries including a child.
Muslims attack and shoot a Christian to death as he was working his farm.
The Iranian government beats a Canadian journalist to death, who was imprisoned for taking pictures of student protesters.
Three people, including two children, are killed and about two dozen others wounded by a Moro Islamic terrorist bombing in a marketplace.
Security officer attempting to defuse a female Fedayeen bomb is killed.
Two office workers are killed in Islamic bombing attack against a Crown Plaza building.
Three sappers are killed in a terrorist bombing attack.
Terrorist landmine kills three Russian servicemen and leaves another three injured.
Fedayeen fighters ambush a patrol vehicle with a landmine then rush in with automatic weapons and grenades.  Nine Russians are dead and five injured.
A militant Muslim group attacks a police station, killing one of the officers and injuring three others.
The Mujahideen kill a civilian in Doda and injure eight others, including five women, in a Baramulla grenade attack on a bus.
Militant Muslim attack on a security patrol leaves two SF personnel dead.
Three civilians are killed in their homes by Muslim militants.
Taliban attack on a police station with automatic weapons kills five and injures at least two.
Islamic extremists ambush a truck and kill three bank employees riding inside.
An ambush on a security patrol leaves two dead and three injured.
Islamic terrorists kill four civilians in four separate encounters (Bomthan, Zadoora, Tampora and SM Pura) on the same day.
al-Aqsa Fatah terrorist stabs three civilians, including one woman.  The Israeli killed used his body to successfully shield the woman from the Muslim's knife.
A man is killed inside his home by the Mujahideen, who also injure his young son in the attack.
A woman is among two people kidnapped from their home by Islamic radicals and murdered in captivity.
Pro-American mayor is shot to death, along with his son, while sitting in his car.
Islamic fundamentalists thought to be behind a bombing at a hospital that injures eleven.
Four civilians killed by Islamic extremists at a roadblock.
Two police personnel, a pregnant woman and a child were killed in a terrorist bombing by Muslim rebels.  Fifteen others were injured.
Terrorist bombing near a police station kills at least three people, including a pregnant woman.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists drag three Hindu villagers, including a woman, out of their houses and execute them.
Eight Afghan soldiers are killed by Taliban militants in a mine explosion.
Two people, including a young girl, are shot to death in their homes by the Mujahideen.
Homemade terrorist bomb kills U.S soldier.
In two separate attacks Islamic terrorists kill two villagers and injure a young girl.
Nineteen people are injured when Muslim militant hurls grenade into a crowded marketplace.
Bus bombing kills one policeman and seriously injures four others.
Sunni attack kills a soldier and an interpreter.  Three others are injured.
Fedayeen suicide attack on an Indian army camp kills eight and wounds at least a dozen.
Brazen terrorist attack by Muslim militants on a crowd of Hindu villagers who had gathered to receive food kills at least seven and injures more than forty.
Shooting attack on a plainly marked Red Cross vehicle kills one staff member and injures the driver.
In separate incidents (Saliya, Khandaypora, Kathsoo, Barath) Muslim terrorists target and kill four civilians.
Jihadis ambush a security patrol, killing two and injuring four.
Grenade attack on police station kills one and injures four.
Government troops and Arab militias loot and destroy two African villages, killing at least forty-two civilians.
Muslim militants attempt a political assassination, leaving one dead and one injured.
A civilian is abducted and brutally killed by the Mujahideen.
Sunni terrorist throws grenade into crowd of soldiers guarding a children's hospital from looters.  Three are killed and four badly injured.
Six afghan policeman are killed in an al-Qaeda attack on their vehicle.
A village headsmen is killed by the Mujahideen.  Twelve civilians sustain injuries from an Anantnag grenade attack on a bus stop.
Islamic fundamentalists detonate a bomb under a vehicle at a crowded bazaar.  Nine people are injured.
Lashkar-e-Taiba terrorists plant a bomb on a passenger bus, killing two and injuring at least forty-seven.
A girl is killed in her home, in an attack that also injures her mother.
Three people, including a woman, are killed in an Islamist bombing at a residence.
Religious cleric assassinated by Taliban gunmen.
Taliban elements attack an international relief agency vehicle and kill the driver.
German woman, one of fifteen hostages held by Islamic fundamentalists in the Sahara desert, dies of heat stroke.
Militant Muslims invade a civilian's home.  They kill one of the resident's daughters and injure another.
Muslim extremists abduct a Christian convert, butcher him and then return his body to his children in pieces.
Three civilians are gunned down by Abu Sayyaf terrorists in the Philippines.
A civilian was killed in his home by a Taliban bombing that also injured two policemen.
In a brutal attack, the Mujahideen kidnap and kill a civilian.
Islamic fundamentalists attack a group of civilians.  Three are killed and three injured.
Four federal investigators are killed by a terrorist attack in Chechnya.
A man is shot to death by the Mujahideen.
The Mujahideen invade a home and beat a young girl to death.  Her sister is severely injured as well.
Muslim suicide bomber drives into a hospital and kills at least fifty.  More than one hundred are injured in the blast.
Two soldiers and an interpreter are killed when Sunni terrorist detonate a landmine under their vehicle.
Islamic extremists stop a civilian vehicle, spray it with machine-gun fire, then slit the throats of the three occupants.
A man is killed in his home by the Mujahideen.
Palestinian gunmen open up on a car carrying a mother and three children.  All were wounded in the attack.
Terrorists kill two people, including a teacher attending a wedding.
A successful Jemaah Islamiyah suicide attack on a Western hotel in Jakarta kills ten and injures over one hundred people.
American oil worker killed by remote-controlled bomb.
A man and his son are pulled out of their home and beheaded by Jihadis.
After undergoing a religious revival, a Saudi college student slashes the throat of a Jewish student with a 4" butterfly knife, nearly decapitating the young man.
Six Afghan soldiers and a driver are killed by a Taliban attack on a government building.
Militant Islamic grenade attack on a military vehicle in a crowded marketplace kills two and injures at least five.
Islamic militants abduct and kill two citizens from Tral.  In Dhok, they kill another civilian in his house.
Jihad ambush on a vehicle kills six soldiers on routine patrol and injures another seven.
At least sixteen people are confirmed dead and more than forty injured by a terrorist car bomb that exploded outside the Jordanian embassy.
The Mujahideen force their way into a house and kill a young man and his father.
Five brothers shot to death in an armed attack outside a mosque.
Two civilians are murdered by Muslim terrorists.  One is shot in his home (Drubgam), the other is abducted and later killed (Kandi Khas).
Five women were murdered in their home by a man who 'doubted their modesty (Muslim 'honor' killing).
A woman is killed inside her home by the Mujahideen.
Hezbollah rocket attack on a village kills a 16 year-old and leaves four other civilians injured.
Two Red Crescent aid workers are killed and three others wounded when their ambulance (bearing the insignia of the Red Cross, however) is attacked by Taliban loyalists.
A civilian is abducted and killed by Islamic terrorists.
Hamas suicide bomber kills one Israeli civilian and injures two others
Fatah suicide bomber kills a 42 year-old father of two in a shopping mall.  Several others are injured.
Two Islamic university students are killed and another injured when a bomb that they were making for a terrorist attack explodes prematurely.
Taliban bomb on a passenger bus kills fifteen, including six children.
Five Russians are killed and three injured in IED attack.
Al-Mansoorain terrorists kill three people and injure nearly fifty others with an IED.
Two civilians are killed in separate Jihad attacks, including one in a bombing at his shop.
Kosovo Muslims waiting in the bushes with automatic weapons ambush Serbian boys (ages 10 to 20) who were returning from a swimming trip.  Two are killed and four injured.
al-Qaeda gunmen kill three security force personnel and injure two in a shootout.
Two Russian soldiers are killed and ten others wounded in attack by Fedayeen terrorists.
Muslim militants plant a bomb on a bicycle that goes off killing at least two and injuring more than forty.
Two civilians are murdered in their homes by the Mujahideen (Thamlot & Kandi).
Grenade lobbed by Muslim terrorists at a police station bounces into passersby, killing one and injuring another seven.
Terrorist attack on a military ambulance kills one British soldier and leaves two others badly injured.
Sixteen civilians are injured when militant Muslims toss a grenade into the street.
Three civilians are murdered in separate attacks by the Mujahideen.
Six Iraqis are killed and nearly sixty injured by attempted terrorist attack on a U.S. position using mortar bombs.
Two Shia, both career professionals, are gunned down by Sunni assassins.  Interestingly, the Shiites retaliate against KFC.
A large-scale attack on a police station in southeastern Afghanistan by Taliban insurgents leaves seven Afghans dead.
Muslims kidnap and cut off the head of a civilian.
Ten Afghan policeman, returning from a funeral, were ambushed and killed by Taliban fundamentalists.
In separate incidents, Muslim terrorists kill three civilians, including the elderly father of a police constable. (Damhal Khushipora, Morha Handa, Bumlakhi).
A fruit merchant is abducted and killed in one of two terror attacks.
At least twenty-three people are killed, and more than one-hundred injured, by Fedayeen suicide bombing attack on a hotel.

Hamas (Islamic Resistance) take credit for blowing up a civilian bus killing at least twenty, including five children and a mother of thirteen (along with her five-month old baby), and injuring more than one hundred, including about forty children.
A doctor is gunned down in a sectarian attack.
Islamic militants kidnap an 85-year-old man and kill him in captivity.
An American interpreter is killed by a Sunni sniper and RPG attack, two others are injured.
Muslim car bomb kills nine Russian soldiers and injures two more.
The body of a young woman is found two days after she is kidnapped by the Mujahideen.
Five people injured by a bomb placed under a restaurant.
Abu Sayyaf gunmen attack the house of a 37-year old Christian woman.  They kill her and injure four members of her family.
Taliban attack on a truck carrying government soldiers leaves at least five dead.
Fedayeen gunmen ambush a British vehicle with a flatbed truck, kill three and wound one.
Terrorists bomb the house of a Shi'ite leader, targeted for his moderate views.  The cleric survived, but three others are killed and ten injured.
Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists force their way into a home and kill a man, his wife, and his daughter-in-law.
Two terrorist bombs in civilian areas kill at least fifty-one people and injure more than one-hundred and fifty.  Muslim student group behind the attack.
Three people were killed in a series of bombings at a cafe and bus stop by Muslim terrorists.
Three policemen were killed in a terrorist RPG attack.
Islamic extremists place bomb on the roof of a car carrying a Russian minister.  The minister is killed and his driver badly injured.
Three Afghan soldiers killed by a Taliban attack on a remote checkpoint.
Militant Muslim lobs a grenade at a police vehicle, it misses, killing a bystander instead and injuring two others.
Three civilians were killed, along with a security officer, and an unknown number injured when Islamic terrorists attack a Hotel with grenades and firearms.
At least eighty-five people are killed in a car bombing by radical Islamists for the purpose of assassinating a moderate Shi'ite cleric.  At least one-hundred forty others are injured.
Israeli couple is attacked by Palestinian gunmen while driving.  The husband is killed and his 24-year old pregnant wife badly injured.
Two civilians are killed in Budgam by the Mujahideen, and another in his home in Kulgam.
Lashkar-e-Toiba a search team, killing four members.
A woman is murdered inside her home by the Mujahideen.
Terrorist grenade attack kills one Serbian, leaves five others injured.
The Muslim Republic drops bombs on an African village earlier in the month, killing at least thirty civilians. (2003)
Bomb disposal specialist is killed, and three other people wounded, while attempting to defuse terrorist bomb.
Sunni roadside bomb kills two military policemen and injures one other.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists kill three members of the same family in a home invasion, including a mother and her 14-year old son.
Terrorist bombing of a bus kills the driver and injures twenty passengers, including three women.
Four civilians, including a father and his two sons, are shot to death by militant Muslim terrorists.
One Iraqi policeman was killed, and at least ten bystanders were injured when a car bomb exploded outside a police station.
Two political activists murdered in a shooting attack by Islamic radicals.
Militant Muslims break up a wedding party and kill five members of the same family including a child.
Fedayeen suicide bombing kills an Iraqi interpreter and injures two U.S. soldiers.
Mujahideen terrorist bombing of a commuter train leaves five civilians dead and about thirty injured.
An Indian woman is killed, and her two children injured, in a failed Fedayeen suicide attack on a military building.
Palestinian gunmen kill an Israeli soldier and injure four more.
Five people attending a funeral for two slain political activists are shot to death in a terrorist attack.
Two people are killed and another nineteen injured when terrorists throw grenades at a wedding party.
Islamic fundamentalists kill two Algerian soldiers and injure three others in a bombing.
A dedicated humanitarian and father of three is killed in a Sunni terrorist ambush while working for a charity organization that was working to clear mines in civilian areas.
Three Sunnis are injured by Shia shooting attack on a mosque.
Muslim car-bombing in a fruit market kills at least seven and injures over thirty-seven.
A Jihad attack on a remote police station leaves three people dead and six injured.
Taliban insurgents stop a Danish relief vehicle carrying aid workers for a refugee project.  They tie up five of them and then execute four with AK-47s.
Taliban attack on a pick-up truck kills five Afghan soldiers and leaves another five injured.
A woman is shot to death by radical Muslims.
One young girl is killed and seven other people injured in a grenade attack by militant Muslims on a market.
Muslim terrorists attempt to assassinate a political figure.  One bodyguard is killed and another injured.
Three Iraqis, including a 12-year old boy, are killed and more than forty others injured by a suicide bomber.
Hamas (Islamic Resistance) bomber detonates explosives outside a cafe.  Seven patron are killed and at least fifty injured.
Eight people are killed and fifteen injured when a Hamas (Islamic Resistance) bomber dressed as an Israeli soldier detonates a suicide bomb at a bus stop.
A 17-year-old girl is strangled by her family for resisting an arranged marriage.
al-Umar Mujahideen hurl a grenade into a busy market, killing a woman and injuring at least fourteen other people.  One of the injured later dies in hospital.
Two civilians are killed, and another fourteen injured, by a IED explosion set by militant Muslims.
Three people, including a former member of parliament, are killed and eight wounded in a terrorist attack.
Four security force personnel are killed, and five more wounded, in a Fedayeen attack.
Two government teachers are killed by militant Muslims, one of whom was abducted and beheaded.
Iraqi police chief killed in a Sunni ambush.  Two others badly injured.
Militants hurl grenade at Albanian soldiers, one is killed and thirteen Iraqi bystanders are injured.
Muslim rebels ambush a group of civilians, killing a teacher and his student.
Fedayeen truck bombing kills at least three people and injures more than twenty-five others.
One civilian is killed in a blast engineered by a Muslim terrorist group.  Seven other people are injured.
Nine Algerian soldiers are killed in an ambush by Islamic fundamentalists.
Terrorists invade a home and open fire on a family.  A man and his son are killed, his daughter is injured.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists attack a security patrol with an IED.  The device kills two and injures one other.
Taliban car bomb kills four in front of the home of a local police commander.
Four civilians are killed in separate Mujahideen attacks, including one who was beheaded.
Man who repented his Islamic beliefs killed by armed Islamists.
Five civilians are killed in separate attacks by Islamic radicals.
Bomb planted by Muslim terrorists in a video camera explodes in a marketplace, killing four and injuring twenty-seven.
Muslim terrorists invade a home, dragging out the husband and wife inside, then hanging them.
Terrorist mortar bombing of a prison kills two U.S. military policemen and injured thirteen others.
Suicide bomber kills one other person and injures sixteen in an explosion outside UN headquarters.
A female suicide bomber motions over two Israeli policemen and then kills them.  Sixteen passersby are also injured.
Militant Muslims kill a man and his son in their home.
The Taliban attack and kill two local humanitarian aid workers.
Bus bombing kills one civilian and injures eighteen.
Grenade attack on a cinema kills two patrons and injures eight.
Female member of the Iraqi governing council dies five days after terrorists ambush her vehicle.  Her two bodyguards were severely injured.
One Somali is killed, and two other civilians injured, by a bomb placed at a hotel housing Western journalists.
One businessman is killed and ten others people are injured in an attack by militant fundamentalists (Hizbut Touheed).
Mortar attack on a crowded marketplace kills nine and injures at least fifteen.
Palestinian gunman infiltrates a settlement, randomly picks a house, and then proceeds to shoot the residents, including an infant girl.
Taliban attack kills seven Afghan bodyguards of local governor.
A 2-year-old child is among four members of a family slaughtered by the Mujahideen in a heinous attack.
Ten people are injured when a bomb goes off on a bus.
Albanian Muslims shoot grenades into a Serbian marketplace, killing two and injuring thirty-nine.
Islamic fundamentalists ambush Algerian military convoy.  Eight soldiers are killed and three injured.
Jihad attack on police vehicle leaves five dead.
Nineteen people are injured when militant Muslims throw a grenade into a bus stop.
Lashker-e-Toiba Fedayeen attack on a police station kills two and injures three.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists shoot and kill an unarmed youth, whose brother was also injured in the attack.
A 44-year-old man murdered for leaving Islam and embracing Christianity.
A female driver is killed and two U.S. soldiers are injured by a roadside bomb in the Sunni triangle.
Muslim extremists open fire on a vehicle carrying a local mayor and his son.  Both are killed in the attack.
Terrorists haul a man out of his house and shoot him to death.
The Mujahideen kill a shopkeeper in his store.
Islamic fundamentalists shoot an Italian aid worker to death on the grounds of the TB hospital she helped to found.
Two Canadian peacekeepers are killed, and three injured, by Taliban landmines targeting the patrol.
Militant Muslims kill three civilians in separate incidents (Budhan, Kreeri Bazaar, Wudar Bala)
Five Iraqis, including four teenagers, are injured by Sunni grenade attack.
Two Iraqis are killed by a bomb placed in a traffic circle.
Motorcycle shooting attack by Sunnis on a bus carrying Shiites on their way to worship leaves at least six dead and eight injured.
Rocket attack by fundamentalists on a train kills the engine driver and injures two other employees.
At least four people are killed and over twenty injured when a Muslim separatist hurls a grenade into a Mosque hosting government officials.
Six Hindus are injured when Muslim terrorists open fire on them as they were returning from temple.
Militant Muslims open fire on a group of civilians, killing two and injuring one.
Nineteen people are killed and more than fifty wounded by a Islamic Jihad bomber in a restaurant.  Three children were among the dead.
Taliban attack on an Afghan military post kills two and injures three.
Armed Islamic extremists kill a communal guard for a small village.
Five people riding in a government vehicle, including a Sunni leader, are assassinated by gunmen.
60-year old Italian medical missionary, a woman honored by the U.N. for her work with refugees, is shot twice in the head while leaving a hospital.
Hezbollah snipers fire from southern Lebanon and kill an Israeli soldier.
Explosive device planted by militant Muslims detonates on a bridge, killing two BSF and injuring three.
Four people are killed in a terrorist ambush.
One Iraqi employee is killed, and another injured, by al-Qaeda mortar attack on a government building.
A Lebanese boy is killed when Hezbollah missiles, intended for Israel, fall short.
Jailed Abu Sayyaf terrorist kills three policemen who were attempting to negotiate the release of hostages.
One Iraqi policeman is killed, and another badly wounded, by a terrorist RPG attack on their checkpoint.
Algerian policeman has his throat slit by Islamic extremists at a roadblock.
Armed Muslims kill at least two Christian villagers and burn homes.
Spanish diplomat assassinated by Muslim terrorists.
Eight Iraqis are killed when two Fedayeen drive their car, packed with explosives, into a police station.  More than thirty are injured.
One dead, two injured, by a 17-year old suicide bomber sent from the al-Aqsa Martyrs Brigade.
Roadside bombing against a bus kills two oil company employees and seriously injures four more.
A man is abducted from his home and killed in captivity by the Mujahideen.
Muslim gunmen attack Christian villagers, killing eight, injuring dozens more and burning at least one church.
80 Taliban fighters on motorbikes attack two government buildings, killing eight people and injuring at least two.
Six people are killed by Fedayeen car-bombing of a hotel.  At least thirty-two others are injured.
Two Iraqi Christians murdered by Holy Warriors.
Militant Muslim attacks on outposts and a convoy leave nine Russians dead and an unknown number injured.
Muslim separatists fire a rocket into a family home, killing a Hindu woman and her 4-year old child.  Two other family members were injured.
One American is killed, and another injured, by landmine while on patrol at oil refinery.
Islamists kill a 75-year-old man in a shooting attack and leave his wife badly injured.
Fedayeen car bomber kills a bystander and injures at least three others outside the Turkish embassy.
One municipal guard is killed, and two others injured by terrorist bomb set by fundamentalists.
The Mujahideen ambush a security patrol, killing one.
Three American security guards are killed by a terrorist bombing on their car in Gaza.
Four people are injured, one seriously, by terrorist bombing of a cafe.
Five policemen (including three Americans) were killed and seven wounded by terrorists in an RPG attack and gun battle.
A government official is killed after Muslim rebels place a bomb in his car.
Islamic militants attack the residence of a district prime minister, killing a civilian and two security personnel and injuring two civilians.  Nine policemen are injured in the ensuing gun battle.
Two government troops are killed, and two wounded by a Taliban roadside bombing attack.
A civilian pick-up truck is bombed by Taliban insurgents, killing the driver, his brother, and two children.
Fatah gunmen ambush an Israeli unit guarding a settlement.  Three are killed and one is injured.
One person is killed and more than fifty injured when a Muslim throws a grenade into a crowded bus terminal.
Militant Muslim throws a grenade into a bus stand, injuring seventeen civilians.
A British couple who dedicated their lives to teaching in Africa are murdered by Islamic terrorists while sitting in their home.
Two settlers are injured in a gun battle with Palestinian infiltrators.
Police chief is gunned down by Muslim terrorists as he leaves a mosque.
Sunni grenade attack kills two children and injures four others.
Two Hamas (Islamic Resistance) terrorists infiltrate a Jewish settlement and then enter a barracks to go room from room shooting female soldiers as they slept.
Two American contractors are killed in a Taliban ambush.
Three civilians are killed and two others injured by Sunni bombing and small arms attack on their vehicle in the Sunni triangle..
At least fourteen people are injured when Islamic militants hurl a grenade at a security patrol along a busy road.
Muslim militant hurls grenade into a bus stop, killing one civilian and injuring nine others.
Baghdad's deputy mayor assassinated in a drive-by shooting.
Jihad rocket attack on a hotel injures 15 people and leaves a U.S. soldier on guard duty dead.
Muslim separatists kill a policeman and two defense volunteers, two days before a larger attack was planned.
First day of Ramadan in Kashmir sees Islamic terrorists blow up a railroad bridge, narrowly missing a civilian passenger train.  Subsequent small arms leaves two civilians and two soldiers dead.
Christian farmer killed by Jemmah Islamiah terrorists while working his field.
At least eleven people are killed, and more that twenty injured, when a Fedayeen bomber targets the International Red Cross, a humanitarian organization helping Iraqis meet basic needs.
Fedayeen bombing attacks on the first day of Ramadan on three Iraqi police stations kills at least sixteen and leaves nearly one hundred injured.
Abu Sayyaf rebels abduct six foreign tourists from a Malaysian resort then use them as human shields in a gun battle.  Five are killed.
Two Algerian soldiers are killed by a landmine planted by the country's Islamic fundamentalists during Ramadan.
Last surviving Muslim terrorist involved in the bridge bombing at Akhnoor opens indiscriminate fire on a family, killing two children and injuring eight.
Three members of a security patrol are killed, and seven others injured in bombing and small arms ambush by militant Muslims.
Islamic rebels lob a grenade into a telegraph office, killing at least three civilians and injuring more than thirty.
Three people, including school children, are killed and an six injured by a Fedayeen car bombing.
Editor of a pro-democracy newspaper gunned down by Islamists.
Five people are injured when suspected Jemaah Islamiah members bomb a Catholic church.
Islamic extremists kill three civilians after stopping them on a road during Ramadan.
Twenty people sustain injuries when a Muslim terrorist tosses a grenade into a crowd.
Three Iraqi civilians killed, and at least two others injured in RPG terrorist attack on police station.
Two civilians are abducted from their homes and killed by the Mujahideen (Shopian & Sopore).
Three civilians are killed in separate Mujahideen attacks.
The leader of a Ahmadiyya religious group is killed by radical Muslims in an attack that also injures several others.
A civilian is abducted and murdered by radical Muslims.
Two civilian contractors are killed by bomb in their vehicle.  Muslim mob celebrates.
Islamic Jihad bombing of a jeep, kills 1 Israeli soldier and leaves five others injured.
Car bomb kills two Iraqis and injures four near a Shiite shrine.
At least two killed and one wounded in militant Islamic shooting attack in Mecca.
Militant Muslims bomb a security patrol, then use small arms fire to kill at three and injure two others.
Christian judge is assassinated in shooting attack.  This occurs a day after another judge is  kidnapped and murdered in Najaf
A wildlife officer is shot to death by the Mujahideen.
Militant Muslims invade three homes and kill three civilians, including a mother.
Three Iraqis are killed, and at least nine other people are injured in two separate terrorist grenade attacks.  The dead include a 10-year old boy.
Three civilians, including a woman, are killed in a brutal attack by Islamic terrorists.
Six U.S. soldiers and judicial workers are killed when their helicopter is shot down during transport.
Four people are injured by Islamic extremists in two separate attacks using small-arms fire and a landmine.
Seventeen people, including five children are killed and one-hundred and twenty-two injured by al-Qaeda suicide bombing in a residential neighborhood.
At least forty-two people are killed, and an unknown number wounded when Jihad militias attack 32 villages, burning houses and setting fire to crops.
Political activist gunned down by Islamic rebels - is the fifth political activist assassinated within the past week.
Militant Muslims kill two civilians in their homes.  One was a photographer, the other a farmer.
Abu Sayyaf rebels ambush a routine patrol, killing one and injuring three.
Two civilians, including a woman, were killed by Islamic terrorists, who used them as human shields in a gun battle.
Six Iraqi civilians are killed, and nine injured in a car bomb blast in the Shiite city of Basra.  School children were among the injured.
Taliban car bombing kills four and injures at least three Afghans.
Over thirty people are killed, and about eighty injured when Fedayeen suicide bombers crash their cars through the gates of an Italian compound and detonate the explosives.
Sunni terrorists shoot a civilian contractor to death, and injure another in an attack on their vehicle.
Three civilians, including a woman, are killed by Muslim terrorists in separate incidents (Gotapora, Srinigar, Pattan).
Terrorists detonate bomb as Russian soldiers are conducting a house search.  Five are killed and ten injured, three critically.
Six worshippers are injured by bomb blast at one of India's holiest shrines.  Elsewhere, in northern Kashmir, a man and his teen-age daughter are killed by militant Muslims.
A church official and his nephew are shot to death by radical Muslims.
Islamics attack two synagogues with car bombs, killing at least twenty-three and injuring over two-hundred and fifty.  The victims included children and at least one pregnant woman.
Taliban terrorists shoot a female French aid worker to death in a motorbike attack.

Terrorists lob a grenade into a military jeep on a crowded street.  One SF personnel is killed and four other people, including two civilians, sustain injuries.  Another ambush in Briyali leaves two SF dead.
A Christian man is dragged from his motorcycle and beaten to death by a Muslim mob.
Three civilians are killed in separate incidents (Anantnag & Tatagaon) by militant Muslims, including a young girl who was tortured and then killed.
At least one person is killed, and more than five others injured when Islamic terrorists attack a hotel with bombs and automatic weapons.
Palestinian (al-Aqsa) gunman approaches checkpoint with an AK-47 concealed in a prayer mat, which he then uses to shoot two Israeli soldiers to death at point-blank range.  He then flees.
Sustained Taliban rocket attack on an airport kills fourteen Afghans and injures at least twenty-three.
Armed Islamists open fire in a cafe, killing a policeman and injuring several patrons.  Elsewhere (El Aouana) a rural watchman dies in an ambush.
Eleven members of a Hindu family, including seven women and a newborn baby are burned alive by a Muslim mob that surrounded their home in the early morning hours.
Two Jews are brutally murdered by Muslims in separate attacks in Paris.  One has his throat slit and eyes gouged while a 53-year old mother is stabbed 27 times in the neck and chest.
Saddam calls again for Holy War.  A child and one other person are then killed by a car bomb aimed at a pro-American Sunni leader.
Jordanian truck driver fires rifle across the border into Israel, killing an Ecuadorian women and injuring four of her tourist companions.
At least four civilians are killed, and at least a half dozen injured, by bomb blast in Kurdish political headquarters.

Coordinated Fedayeen suicide truck bombings, one near a British bank and the other outside the British consulate, kill more than thirty and injure over four-hundred people.  Al-Qaeda and another Islamic group claim responsibility for the killing.
Two citizens are shot dead by Muslim militants.  One in his house and the other as he was returning home from worship.
Four people were killed when Islamists hurled a grenade into a market stall that was selling alcohol.  One of the dead was an 11-year old boy.  Some twenty others were injured.
Six Iraqi policeman and three civilians are killed in a Fedayeen car bombing.  More than fifteen others were injured.
Fedayeen suicide bomber kills nine Iraqis and injures ten at a police station.  A subsequent explosion in the same area injures at least two children.
Two Israelis are shot dead while guarding a construction site.
A civilian is shot to death inside his home by the Mujahideen.
A Muslim mob throws a concrete block in the way of a military vehicle, causing it two crash.  The mob then drags the two soldiers out, beats them and then slits their throats.
An assassination attempt on a Hindu politician by Muslim radicals leaves two people dead and four injured.
Assassination attempt by Palestinian gunmen on Nablus mayor, said to be working with Jews, leaves his brother dead.
One person was killed, and twelve others injured when militants hurl a grenade into a busy intersection.
Five people in the middle of planning a wedding were killed, and four others injured when Moro Islamic Front terrorists strafe their house with gunfire.
Nine people, including a Saudi prince, are ambushed and killed by Islamic extremists while on a hunting trip in the desert.
A man is gunned down inside his home by Islamic terrorists.
Militant Muslims fire at a passenger vehicle, killing one and injuring four.
Fedayeen ambush kills seven Spanish intelligence agents, riding in two cars, with grenades and automatic weapons.
Two Japanese diplomats, and their Iraqi driver are shot and killed by Fedayeen terrorists.
At least four people are killed, and eight injured when Muslim militants defy a brokered cease-fire and hijack two civilian vehicles.
Two Hindu migrants are gunned down as they sat outside their house.
Two South Korean engineers are killed, and two others seriously wounded by Fedayeen terrorists while traveling in their vehicle.
Nineteen policeman and two civilians are injured when militant Muslims attack their station with grenades.
A Muslim doctor deliberately allows a Jewish patient to die from an easily treatable condition.
Abu Sayyaf terrorists round up four villagers, line them up on a road and shoot them.
A UN worker was killed by a Taliban attack while conducting a census.  Eleven others were injured.
Regional governor survives assassination attempt by Islamic extremists, with injuries.  His brother is murdered.
At least three Iraqis and one U.S. soldier are killed by a roadside bomb on a crowded street.  Thirteen others, including eleven Iraqis are injured.

Mujahideen suicide bomber detonates explosive on a Russian commuter train carrying civilians to work.  At forty-four people, including children eventually die and about one-hundred and fifty others are injured.
Eighteen Afghan civilians, including three children are injured by a bomb detonated from a parked bicycle.  The Taliban takes credit for the attack.
24-year old police officer is gunned down in a store by Islamic extremists.
Taliban ambush kills two Pakistani engineers working to restore country's infrastructure.
Four Russian soldiers are killed while investigating an explosion at a school.  Another is taken hostage.
Ten people, including civilians and policemen are injured in Mujahideen grenade and shooting attacks in Kashmir.
Bombers target a mosque, killing two and injuring three.
Fifty-nine U.S. soldiers and at least three Iraqis sustain mostly light injuries when an Islamic suicide car bomber attempts an attack.
Drive-by shooting attack leaves one American hospital guard dead and two others injured.
Female Fedayeen suicide bomber kills six people near the Kremlin and injures at least fourteen, including several college students.
Muslim terrorists lob a grenade into a bus station and then fire indiscriminately into the crowd, killing three and injuring at least fifteen.
Militant Sunnis kill two U.S. soldiers on guard duty at two gas stations in drive-by shootings.  Four others are injured.
Three Fedayeen suicide bombers in a furniture truck blow themselves up at the gates of a U.S. military base.  One guard is killed and fourteen others wounded.
Palestinian gunmen ambush a van carrying Israeli worshippers on their way home from a prayer service.  Seven are injured.
Young boy is killed by a bomb while sifting through garbage outside a house owned by President Karzai of Afghanistan.
Seventeen city workers, policemen, and civilian bystanders are killed, and another thirty-three injured by Fedayeen suicide blast.
Ambushes by the Moro Islamic Front leave four villagers dead and two wounded.
At least nine border guards are murdered by Muslim rebels who crossed over from Chechnya to attack a hospital.
Another Fedayeen suicide bomber kills himself and injures seven Iraqi policemen.
Fedayeen suicide bomber drives car bomb to gates of a police station.  Eight Iraqis are killed in the explosion and at least ten injured.
Islamic extremists shoot and kill two policemen.
Government troops seeking refuge in a mosque are attacked by Moro Islamic Front terrorists.  Four are killed and twelve are missing.
Terrorists shoot dead one civilian and abduct four others from a remote village.
A Shiite leader is gunned down near his home by Sunni loyalists.
Fedayeen attack on a police station kills two officers and leaves three more injured.
Terrorist blast kills one woman working for the main Shiite party in their office building.  At least five others are injured.
Taliban terrorists attack a remote security post with machine guns and kill five Afghan soldiers as they are eating their evening meal.
Fourteen people are injured in a grenade attack against a police station by militant Muslims.
Roadside bomb in the Sunni Triangle kills two Americans and an Iraqi translator.  Two others are wounded.
Top level judge shot six times in the back by Fedayeen loyalists.
Two Israelis are killed when members of the al-Aksa Martyrs Brigade open up on a security patrol with grenades and automatic weapons.
Ten people are injured when Muslim militants lob a grenade at a security patrol near a hospital.
Civilian bus is bombed by Sunni terrorists.  The driver is killed and two passengers are injured.
A suicide car bomber kills three other people and injures at least a dozen innocents.
Government-sponsored militias in this Islamic Republic, kill another two dozen villagers - adding to a toll of more than two million over 20 years.
Suicide bomber kills four Israeli civilians, including a teenage girl and injures at least eighteen more at a bus stop.
Assassination attempt on Pakistani President by Muslim extremists, involving several car bombs, leaves seventeen dead and at least forty injured.
A 13-year-old girl is killed, and eleven other people are injured when Muslim terrorists trigger a roadside bomb against a transport vehicle.
An irrigation department employee is killed by the Mujahideen and eight others suffer injuries in a Shopian grenade attack.
Islamic Fedayeen terrorists kill twelve, including four Bulgarians, two Thai engineers and six civilians in three separate suicide attacks.  At least thirty-seven others are injured.
Six Afghan policemen are killed by two suicide bombers being transported for investigation.
A man is lynched by Islamists.
Two Iraqi children and one American are killed by a roadside bomb on a crowded street.  Five others are injured.
Five Afghan soldiers are killed when their post is attacked by Taliban terrorists.  Three are injured.
A man is pulled from his house and killed just outside his village.
Muslim terrorists injure ten people waiting for a bus with a grenade.
Thirty-four personnel are injured when Hizbul Mujahideen militants bomb a military patrol.
One Iraqi is killed, and three others injured in a roadside bomb attack.
A car bomb rips through a restaurant, killing eight people and injuring at least thirty-five.
